programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: Coverage from the sixth day's play at Roland Garros, featuring the opening third-round singles matches in the men's and women's draws. After struggling through the first two rounds in five sets, Andy Murray produced an altogether more dominant display at this stage last year, defeating Ivo Karlovic 6-1, 6-4, 7-6. Meanwhile, eventual women's champion Garbine Muguruza comfortably defeated Yanina Wickmayer 6-3, 6-0.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: The seventh day's play at Roland Garros, where the third-round singles matches are scheduled to conclude in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. Eventual champion Novak Djokovic ended the run of Great Britain's Aljaz Bedene at this stage last year with a dominant 6-2, 6-3, 6-3 victory. In the women's competition, top seed Serena Williams prevailed 6-4, 7-6 against Kristina Mladenovic, and her sister Venus was also victorious, beating Alize Cornet 7-6, 1-6, 6-0. Meanwhile, 200 champion Ana Ivanovic's run came to an end she was beaten 6-4, 6-4 by Elina Svitolina.(n)
